alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 22 at 5:24AM CST until February 23 at 9:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...The Gila Region, most of southwest and south central New Mexico and parts of west El Paso. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will make driving hazardous, especially along north/south running roads and highways. The strong winds will also create area of blowing dust which will cause quickly changing visibilities for motorists.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
